author: Like Stories of Old
description:
Want to restore the planet’s ecosystems and see your impact in monthly videos? The first 100 people to join Planet Wild with my code STORIES210 will get the first month for free at: https://planetwild.com/r/likestoriesofold/join/210
If you want to get to know them better first, check out their project protecting one of Europe’s last ancient forests: https://planetwild.com/r/likestoriesofold/m31/210

It's 2004, and two men set out on a trip not knowing they were about to create one of the last portraits of a world that was right on the precipice of changing forever.

0:00 Two Seasons, Two Decades
2:09 The Last Analog Adventure
6:15 The Democratization of Imagery
9:50 A True Measure of Distance
12:37 Domesticating the World
14:38 The Rise of Modern Travel Culture
16:41 Chasing "Authenticity"
18:32 A Surprising Change of Heart
21:10 Reclaiming the Adventure
24:14 The Real Wake-Up Call
26:32 20 Years From Now
29:08 Making a Difference

Watch this video ad-free on Nebula: https://nebula.tv
title: This Travel Show Accidentally Filmed the Last Real Adventure
